shortdesc.i: This attribute is only meaningful in events that are recurrence exceptions.

section.p: A recurrence exception is a differing instance of a recurring event. The originalStartTime property stores the time and date of the recurrence instance that is replaced by this event. For example: a daily meeting at 2:00 PM that is rescheduled to 3:00 PM on a given day would have an originalStartTime of 2:00 PM.
